bug.author: EigenFace
bug.description:
Small typo at <denchmark-link:http://tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/array_ops.md#AUTOGENERATED-shapes-and-shaping>http://tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/array_ops.md#AUTOGENERATED-shapes-and-shaping</denchmark-link>
Under the reshape example it says:
tensor 't' is [[[1, 1], [2, 2]] [[3, 3], [4, 4]]] tensor 't' has shape [2, 2]
But I think t initially has the shape [2, 2, 2] not [2, 2].
